item.title: evaluating several hugo themes
item.description: 15:19 Tuesday 25 June 2019 JST I have gone through all the themes in the repo for All Hugo’s Themes and come up with a list of several which do a lot of these things: content on top page list page for blog/ list page for journal/ paginate blog/ paginate journal/ show tags paginate tags show categories paginate categories nicely show Youtube videos I don’t know if a single one does all the above things, but here is my list so far:
